description: Classic trekking trousers Barents Pro are a favourite among hunters, and they are now also available in G-1000 Silent Eco with silent press buttons for even better hunting performance. The brushed fabric allows you to move silently, and is both durable and weather resistant. Reinforcements over the rear and knees resist moisture when you sit or kneel down and there are seven pockets for a map, knife, multitool etc.
name: Fjallraven Barents Pro Hunting Trousers - Mens
